CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zephyr Gas Index relative to GeoHeat Commodity?
SRP.A: Zephyr Gas Index is {below} GeoHeat Commodity in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zephyr Gas Index}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {GeoHeat Commodity}.

VE.Q: What is Solara Power Futures's Natural Gas Prices in 1980?
VE.A: Solara Power Futures's natural gas prices in 1980 is {2.94} $/cubic meter.

VE.Q: What is Lumina Energy Market's Natural Gas Prices in 1981?
VE.A: Lumina Energy Market's natural gas prices in 1981 is {3.23} $/cubic meter.

VE.Q: What is SkyFlow Water Index's Natural Gas Prices in 1979?
VE.A: SkyFlow Water Index's natural gas prices in 1979 is {1.74} $/cubic meter.

VE.Q: What are the natural gas prices of AquaSource Trading, SkyFlow Water Index, and Solara Power Futures in 1983?
VE.A: AquaSource Trading's natural gas prices is {2.25} $/cubic meter, SkyFlow Water Index's natural gas prices is {2.31} $/cubic meter, Solara Power Futures's natural gas prices is {3.86} $/cubic meter.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Natural Gas Prices in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum natural gas prices is {1.54} $/cubic meter.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Natural Gas Prices in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum natural gas prices is {3.93} $/cubic meter.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Natural Gas Prices level recorded for AquaSource Trading?
EVJ.A: AquaSource Trading reached approximately {2.48} $/cubic meter in {1977}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Natural Gas Prices level recorded for AquaSource Trading?
EVJ.A: AquaSource Trading's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.54} $/cubic meter in {1980}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Natural Gas Prices?
SC.A: The average total natural gas prices is {14.54} $/cubic meter.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Natural Gas Prices exceed 15.15 $/cubic meter? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {17.11} $/cubic meter in {1982}, {17.86} $/cubic meter in {1983}, {15.32} $/cubic meter in {1981}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Natural Gas Prices go below 13.54 $/cubic meter? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {13.14} $/cubic meter in {1979}, {13.54} $/cubic meter in {1977}, {12.09} $/cubic meter in {1976}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Natural Gas Prices fall between 13.63 and 15.07 $/cubic meter? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1979, did the total Natural Gas Prices experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total natural gas prices between 1978 and 1979 was {smaller} than between 1976 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, did the total Natural Gas Prices experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total natural gas prices between 1982 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1977 and 1980.

NC.Q: Was the total Natural Gas Prices in 1978 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total natural gas prices in 1978 was {higher} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1983, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1979 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1977 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1979 and 1983.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Zephyr Gas Index} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {GeoHeat Commodity, AquaSource Trading, SkyFlow Water Index, Solara Power Futures, Lumina Energy Market, Zephyr Gas Index}.
